title: Co-op Vs. AI Bots still buy Green wards
body: I was playing a bot game with my level 8 mate, and I happened to press tab to check his build, and noticed...the bots still carry green wards? It's not a detrimental bug, if anything it made me chuckle, but I figured I'd bring this up to the devs. Thanks guys.

Hey Gladiir,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this particular issue. :]

Could you maybe give the intermediate bots the new masteries? Or make hard bots with them?

(probably not the right place to post/ask this but might as well mention it since the thread is talking about AI bots)

I'm actually not sure what the plan is, as this isn't my area of expertise. *(I actually looked this up in the database to see if it was a know issue. :x)* However, I'd be happy to pass the feedback along!

I don't know if it's been fixed yet, but I played an Intermediate AI game on the first day the patch came out and none of the AI had the new Keystone Masteries.  Either it was a glitch an they just weren't visible, or they actually weren't updated.  I'm guessing it's the latter, but I'm not positive.  

I remember the old AI supposedly did use Masteries/Runes, but these new ones are not doing it.  I don't play many AI games anymore, but they are a decent place for learning how a champion's kit works.  While the AI for this game is never going to be perfect, it should at least have the same basic aspects as a normal PVP match.

The bots have always don this, being able to purchase items that no longer exist. While some of the items may have been fixed by now (haven't done bots in a while) and I can guess why they can do it, will the other items that cannot be purchased by us be removed from the bots too?
